General.Name: Hubei Yihua Chemical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Yihua Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical fertilizers and products in China and internationally. The company offers urea, diammonium phosphate, polyvinyl chloride and caustic soda, hydrosulfite, sulfuric and phosphoric acid, synthetic ammonia, chlorinated polyethylene, and fine chemical products. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Yichang, China.
